nodes.text: The Minyavish were a sentient species native to the planet Qaras. For seven thousand years they saw themselves as managers of the planet with native Jessar species as their servants. In 44 ABY, the Minyavish were revolted against by the enslaved Jessar. The Jessar then forced the Minyavish to leave the planet.

The Minyavish were roughly humanoid with short legs, round torsos, barrel chests, arms with round shoulders, and large heads. They had huge golden eyes, with slit shaped pupils, which were darker gold in color. Their pale blue skin was covered in different colored feathers including purple, green, and gold. Their blood was the color of golden honey
Page 132 of of Fate of the Jedi: Ascension says "evidence was located in a safe deposit box on Minyavish," suggesting Minyavish is a planet. Page 135 again refers to "evidence on Minyavish."
